item.description:
Recreational rowing for all new and novice rowers with little or no sculling experience. Two, 2 hour coached sessions with Brian Chorney: Head Coach of Endicott College & U.S. Rowing Level II Certified Coach. Launch a summer for fun and fitness learning the proper sculling technique from Little Harbor Boathouse, 40 Doaks Lane, Marblehead.

Two 2 hour classes. Sat & Sun Jun 19 & 20 from 4 - 6 p.m. Program fee: $125.
All equipment and PFDâ€™s provided.

3 slots left! Register today!

Click on this link for details & 2010 Summer Rowing Program Registration Form

Or contact Maryellen at: 781-990-3552

group.name: Rowing Gals Community Rowing & Paddling Meetup

item.name: Learn-to-Row! Sat & Sun Jun 19 & 20 | 4 - 6 p.m.
